description: This file defines the 'CloudsBackground' class responsible for generating and animating layered clouds with parallax effect in a pixel-art style for a retro platformer background. It includes methods for drawing stylized clouds and managing multiple cloud layers with randomized properties.

classes.name: CloudsBackground
classes.description: A class managing multiple cloud layers with parallax scrolling, cloud rendering, and animation for a vibrant retro game background.

methods.name: constructor(width, height, opts = {})
methods.description: Initializes cloud layers with randomized cloud objects, configuring their properties like position, size, speed, and palette based on provided options.

methods.name: drawCloud(ctx, x, y, w, h, style = "retro", color = "#fff", alpha = 1, flip = false)
methods.description: Utility method to draw a stylized, chunky pixel cloud shape with optional flipping, coloring, and transparency.

methods.name: draw(ctx, time = 0)
methods.description: Renders all cloud layers with respective parallax offsets based on elapsed time, creating a moving cloud background effect.

ctags.name: drawCloud
ctags.pattern: /^  drawCloud(ctx, x, y, w, h, style = "retro", color = "#fff", alpha = 1, flip = false) {$/
ctags.signature: (ctx, x, y, w, h, style = "retro", color = "#fff", alpha = 1, flip = false)
